original_title: SOE losses equal the cost of education and health: Siyambalapitiya
original_body_lines: State Finance Minister Ranjith Siyambalapitiya said that State-Owned Enterprises (SOE) have become a hot topic as it is a burden to the government, despite the intentions they were initiated with.
“By 2020 the losses incurred were some Rs. 484 billion, equivalent to the cost of education and healthcare,” he said.
